events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The user's request about returning a jacket and receiving a refund has been categorized under Refund.
Support agent Alice has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! I’m Alice from customer support. I’m here to assist you with your jacket return and refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the return so we can proceed with your refund?
The order number is 789456123 and the jacket is too small even though I ordered my usual size. I really need the refund quickly.
Thank you for the info. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once received, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label offer. I appreciate the clear instructions on how the refund will be handled.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund back to your original payment method. Please check your account for confirmation.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory regarding your jacket return experience.
Since the refund has been received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for reaching out to us.
